Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the exterior is covered with a lightly burnished brown slip and remains of five lines of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Cemeteries and Osireion Excavations Group
Bibliographic references: Frankfort 1933 / The Cenotaph of Seti I at Abydos (no.16,p.95)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393789) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393789)
Almásy-Martin 2020 / Demotic, Greek and Coptic ostraca from Abydos in the British Museum (no.14)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.BM Abydos Dem. 14 (Edition abbreviation according to Oates et al. 2001)
